Hi Bitbucket Migration Team,

The following repository IDs have been claimed:

```{r}
#| error: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(htmltools)

if (!is.null(params$BB_IDs) && length(params$BB_IDs) > 0) {
  df <- data.frame(BB_ID = params$BB_IDs)
  
  kable(df, format = "html") %>%
    kable_styling(
      full_width = FALSE,
      font_size = 10
    ) %>%
    row_spec(
      0,
      background = "#e0e0e0",
      bold = TRUE
    )
} else {
  HTML("No repository IDs were selected.")
}
```

The following details have been included in the claim:

```{r}
#| error: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| echo: false

if (!is.null(params$message) && nchar(params$message) > 0) {
  HTML(params$message)
} else {
  HTML("No additional message provided.")
}
```

The claim was submitted by `r params$logged_in_user`.
